an4.58:1.1: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an4.58:2.1: “Bhojanam, gahapati, dadamano ariyasavako patiggahakanam cattari thanani deti.
an4.58:2.3: Ayum deti, vannam deti, sukham deti, balam deti.
an4.58:2.4: Ayum kho pana datva ayussa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an4.58:2.5: Vannam datva … sukham datva … balam datva balassa bhagi hoti dibbassa va manusassa va.
an4.58:2.6: Bhojanam, gahapati, dadamano ariyasavako patiggahakanam imani cattari thanani detiti.
